name: Sealer Assist
description:
Sealer Assist is a Card based, Pixel Art role playing game set in a world
after a giant calamity has happened. take control of your named
protagonist and set out on a journey to save the world from the
impending Re-Death.

KEY RELEASE GAME FEATURES
  • Over 150 Attacks, builds and Cards
  • Interesting enemies
  • Pixel art
  • Skill & Turn based Combat
  • Developed by a Community of Dedicated fans
  • Enriched Story
